subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hi how are you ? Do you ship to Australia? How much is shipping ?
Thank you Greg

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi G B,  We can ship to Australia with a base shipping cost of $9.90 and free delivery on orders over $299.

Hi I ordered the Pro X ultra slim pedals and baseplate from Aliexpress.com how long will shipping take ? The order hasn't changed status in nearly 48 hours.. Thanks

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
Hi G B,     Pello, please provide us with your order number and we will check it for you.

Order ID 8201776481890899

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Still looking at order that hasn't moved in 4 days
